name: geopulse
description: GeoPulse - Location tracking and timeline application

scripts.test:e2e:docker: cd tests && docker-compose -f docker-compose.e2e.yml up --build --exit-code-from playwright-tests
scripts.test:e2e:clean: cd tests && docker-compose -f docker-compose.e2e.yml down -v && docker system prune -f

author: tess1o
